text:
Collin Priest is a Dutch songwriter and record producer based in North Brabant. Collin is better known for his dance music.
Career.
Collin was born and raised in Sprang-Capelle, Netherlands. In 2013, he released his debut album "DON'T STOP". In 2018, he released "BODY ROCK", which consisted of 2 singles. In January, he collaborated with an American record label Nervous Records and released a single "FALLING FOR YOU".
In 2020, under the music label Glasgow Underground Recordings, he released "DIGITAL LOVE 5" along with Kevin McKay.
